data.title: 2024 Wyndham Championship Thursday TV coverage: How to watch Round 1
data.meta_description: How to watch the 2024 Wyndham Championship on Thursday, including full TV coverage and streaming information for Round 1 in North Carolina.
data.text:
The 2024 Wyndham Championship kicks off Thursday with the first round at Sedgefield Country Club in North Carolina. Here’s everything you need to know to watch the Wyndham Championship on Thursday, including full TV coverage, streaming info and tee times.

How to watch Wyndham Championship on Thursday

Major champion Shane Lowry technically has a PGA Tour win this season, the Zurich Classic of New Orleans alongside teammate Rory McIlroy, but he has yet to capture a solo win in 2024.

This week will be his final chance to enter the winner’s circle in the regular season before the FedEx Cup Playoffs begin next week, and for which Lowry is currently ranked 10th.

And the action gets started on Thursday.

You can watch the first round of the Wyndham Championship on TV via Golf Channel, which will air coverage beginning at 3 p.m. ET. PGA Tour Live on ESPN+ will provide exclusive streaming coverage, including featured group coverage, starting at 6:45 a.m. ET, while Peacock will provide a simulcast of Golf Channel’s Thursday TV coverage.

Below you will find everything you need to watch the first round of the 2024 Wyndham Championship.

Get ESPN+

$10.99/month

With an ESPN+ subscription, you gain access to PGA Tour Live, where you can stream the best PGA Tour events live from wherever you want.

How to watch Wyndham Championship on TV Thursday

Golf Channel will air first-round TV coverage of the 2024 Wyndham Championship from 3-6 p.m. ET on Thursday.

How to stream Wyndham Championship online Thursday

You can stream the first round of the 2024 Wyndham Championship on Thursday via Peacock and ESPN+. Peacock will provide a simulcast of Golf Channel’s TV coverage starting at 3 p.m. ET, and ESPN+ will provide exclusive early coverage and featured group coverage beginning at 6:45 a.m. ET.
